misc: Rarely seen on the course without a drink in his hand
biography: Martin, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is a golfer known for his relaxed demeanor and unwavering spirit. Representing the esteemed St. Laurence Golf club, Martin is rarely seen on the course without a drink in hand, a testament to his laid-back approach to the sport.

With nine past appearances under his belt, Martin's experience is undeniable. A past champion of the Hector Trophée and a Victor trophy winner, Martin has proven his ability to perform under pressure and lead his team to victory.

As he prepares for his tenth appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025, Martin remains a formidable competitor. His blend of skill, experience, and jovial attitude makes him a beloved figure among players and spectators alike. Whether he's sinking a crucial putt or sharing a laugh with his teammates, Martin embodies the true spirit of the game.
